ol.li:
Contains zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ISDLOC"
This participantRole MAY contain exactly one [1..1] addr
The street address for the place where the injury occurred. Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.
This participantRole MAY contain zero or one [0..1] scopingEntity
This scopingEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PLC"
This scopingEntity Contains zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This scopingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] desc
A description of the type of place where the injury occurred. Possible entries are "at home", "farm", "factory", "office building", "restaurant". Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.

This scopingEntity Contains zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This scopingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] desc
A description of the type of place where the injury occurred. Possible entries are "at home", "farm", "factory", "office building", "restaurant". Required if the decedent suffered an injury leading to death.
